xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.3 Hetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika » 2.3.3 Abyākatapada » 2.3.3.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Nahetu-naārammaṇa
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Abyākatapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Nahetu-naārammaṇa
41.
1347Hetuvippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetuvippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (1)
1348Hetusampayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetuvippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
42.
1349Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1350Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1351Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1352(Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
